replies.body: Lions Tigers or Bears?
replies.body_tagged: Lions Tigers or Bears?

replies.body: How did you come up with your name?
replies.body_tagged: How did you come up with your name?

replies.body:
@Snowcone
Bears. Gotta love the furry beasts. 

@mhanif
idk. I was sitting at my desk one day and put random words together. Midnight and Beats came as a pair so I went with that at the last moment (my name was going to be something else xd), but why I put midnight and beats together I'll never know for the life of me.
replies.body_tagged:
@Snowcone
Bears. Gotta love the furry beasts. 

@mhanif
idk. I was sitting at my desk one day and put random words together. Midnight and Beats came as a pair so I went with that at the last moment (my name was going to be something else xd), but why I put midnight and beats together I'll never know for the life of me.

replies.body: What were you going to name your account before you chose 'MidnightBeats'? C:
replies.body_tagged: What were you going to name your account before you chose 'MidnightBeats'? C:

replies.body:
It was going to be one of those cool but unknown meaning names. You know, sort of like what Jake has (Averisvely) or Peachy had (Zuvareon). 

I don't want to reveal it, because I may use it later on :)
